description: Fix issue 548 where ``--include/--exclude`` arguments for various ``aws s3`` commands were prepending the CWD instead of the source directory for filter patterns
Fix issue 552 where a remote location without a trailing slash would show a malformed XML error when using various  ``aws s3`` commands
Add support for tagging in ``aws emr`` command
Add support for georestrictions in ``aws cloudfront`` command
Add support for new audio compression codecs in the ``aws elastictranscoder`` command
Update the ``aws cloudtrail`` command to the latest API

Add support for the new China (Beijing) Region. Note now includes support for the newly announced China (Beijing) Region, the service endpoints will not be accessible until the Region’s limited preview is launched in early 2014. To find out more about the new Region and request a limited preview account, please visit http://www.amazonaws.cn/.
